item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: Currently Reading Books Deep Work: Rules for Focused Success in a Distracted World - Cal Newport [Link] The Daily Stoic - Ryan Holiday [Link] Halo Data - Caroline Carruthers & Peter Jackson [Link] The Checklist Manifesto: How To Get Things Right -Atul Gawande [Link] Papers & Articles Simple tools for mastering color in scientific figures To Read Books Surviving AI: The promise and peril of artificial intelligence [Link] Papers & Articles Read Atomic Habits - James Clear #non-fiction #book Almanack of Naval Ravikant - Eric Jorgenson #non-fiction #book Essentialism - The Disciplined Pursuit of Less - Greg McKeown #non-fiction #book 68 Bits of Unsolicited Advice by Kevin Kelly Life is Short by Paul Graham The Day You Became A Better Writer by Scott Adams
